Uses of Interface
com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters.TokenRegexFilter

  • Packages that use TokenRegexFilter 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters
    Token filters, which indicate portions of text to be tokenised as a single block, regardless of the statistical model (if it exists).

    • Uses of TokenRegexFilter in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters

      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters that return TokenRegexFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TokenRegexFilter TokenFilterService.getTokenRegexFilter(String regex)
      Like TokenFilterService.getTokenRegexFilter(String, int, String), but the group defaults to 0, and a null replacement.
      TokenRegexFilter TokenFilterService.getTokenRegexFilter(String regex, int groupIndex, String replacement)
      Get a token filter that applies a regex to a given text, and marks an matches found as tokens.
      In addition, if a replacement is provided, the text of the token will be set to the value of the replacement.
      If the surroundings of the token are important, the token itself can be indicated via a group in the regex.
      TokenRegexFilter TokenFilterService.getTokenRegexFilter(String regex, String replacement)
      Like TokenFilterService.getTokenRegexFilter(String, int, String), but the group defaults to 0.
